languages.text: "Я тот ритуал не видела, Вайс меня выставил. Но и того, что донеслось до прочих палуб, хватило, чтобы в штаны наложить. Вайс — старик могучий, но в голове у него все совсем скверно. По-плохому скверно, по-астропатски. Дважды подумайте, хотите ли вы рисковать и дать этому шанс выбраться наружу".

"I didn't see the ritual — Weisz kicked me out. But the echoes of it that reached the decks were enough to scare me shitless. Weisz is a mighty old grox, but his head is a mess. And I mean the bad kind of a mess, the Astropathic kind. I say we think twice before we risk having whatever lives inside his head crawl out."
languages.original_text: "Я тот ритуал не видела, Вайс меня выставил. Но и того, что донеслось до прочих палуб, хватило, чтобы в штаны наложить. Вайс — старик могучий, но в голове у него все совсем скверно. По-плохому скверно, по-астропатски. Дважды подумайте, хотите ли вы рисковать и дать этому шанс выбраться наружу".

languages.text: «No estuve presente en el ritual; Weisz me echó de la sala, pero los ecos que llegaron a las cubiertas bastaron para acojonarme. Weisz es un grox viejo y fuerte, pero su cabeza es un desastre. De los malos, quiero decir; un desastre Astropático. En mi opinión, deberíamos pensarlo muy bien antes de arriesgarnos a que salga lo que sea que tenga ahí dentro».
languages.original_text: "I didn't see the ritual — Weisz kicked me out. But the echoes of it that reached the decks were enough to scare me shitless. Weisz is a mighty old grox, but his head is a mess. And I mean the bad kind of a mess, the Astropathic kind. I say we think twice before we risk having whatever lives inside his head crawl out."

traits.locale_text: «No estuve presente en el ritual; Weisz me echó de la sala, pero los ecos que llegaron a las cubiertas bastaron para acojonarme. Weisz es un grox viejo y fuerte, pero su cabeza es un desastre. De los malos, quiero decir; un desastre Astropático. En mi opinión, deberíamos pensarlo muy bien antes de arriesgarnos a que salga lo que sea que tenga ahí dentro».

languages.text: 「私は儀式を見ていないわ…ワイズに追い出されたのよ。でも、デッキに響いたそのエコーで、十分なくらい恐ろしかったわね。ワイズは年寄りの蜥蜴牛だけど、頭の中はメチャクチャよ。感応通信官的に言って、悪い意味のメチャクチャね。よく考えないと、彼の頭の中にいる何かが這い出てくる危険があるわ」
languages.original_text: "I didn't see the ritual — Weisz kicked me out. But the echoes of it that reached the decks were enough to scare me shitless. Weisz is a mighty old grox, but his head is a mess. And I mean the bad kind of a mess, the Astropathic kind. I say we think twice before we risk having whatever lives inside his head crawl out."

traits.locale_text: 「私は儀式を見ていないわ…ワイズに追い出されたのよ。でも、デッキに響いたそのエコーで、十分なくらい恐ろしかったわね。ワイズは年寄りの蜥蜴牛だけど、頭の中はメチャクチャよ。感応通信官的に言って、悪い意味のメチャクチャね。よく考えないと、彼の頭の中にいる何かが這い出てくる危険があるわ」

languages.text: “我没有亲眼看到那场仪式，威茨把我撵走了，但传到甲板上的回声真的是要把我吓尿了。威茨这个老王八蛋很厉害，但他的脑子里简直是乱七八糟，而且是很要命的那种乱七八糟，星语者的那种。要是举行仪式，他脑子里的东西很可能会爬出来。要我说的话，这件事情真的得好好想想。”
languages.original_text: "I didn't see the ritual — Weisz kicked me out. But the echoes of it that reached the decks were enough to scare me shitless. Weisz is a mighty old grox, but his head is a mess. And I mean the bad kind of a mess, the Astropathic kind. I say we think twice before we risk having whatever lives inside his head crawl out."

traits.locale_text: “我没有亲眼看到那场仪式，威茨把我撵走了，但传到甲板上的回声真的是要把我吓尿了。威茨这个老王八蛋很厉害，但他的脑子里简直是乱七八糟，而且是很要命的那种乱七八糟，星语者的那种。要是举行仪式，他脑子里的东西很可能会爬出来。要我说的话，这件事情真的得好好想想。”

languages.text: "Ich habe das Ritual nicht gesehen. Weisz hat mich hinausgeworfen. Doch schon das Echo, das die Decks erreichte, hat mir ungeheure Angst gemacht. Weisz ist ein mächtiger alter Grox, doch sein Kopf ist verdorben. Und zwar auf übelste Weise verdorben, auf die astropathische Weise. Wir sollten es uns gut überlegen, ob wir riskieren wollen, etwas aus diesem Kopf herauskriechen zu lassen."
languages.original_text: "I didn't see the ritual — Weisz kicked me out. But the echoes of it that reached the decks were enough to scare me shitless. Weisz is a mighty old grox, but his head is a mess. And I mean the bad kind of a mess, the Astropathic kind. I say we think twice before we risk having whatever lives inside his head crawl out."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe das Ritual nicht gesehen. Weisz hat mich hinausgeworfen. Doch schon das Echo, das die Decks erreichte, hat mir ungeheure Angst gemacht. Weisz ist ein mächtiger alter Grox, doch sein Kopf ist verdorben. Und zwar auf übelste Weise verdorben, auf die astropathische Weise. Wir sollten es uns gut überlegen, ob wir riskieren wollen, etwas aus diesem Kopf herauskriechen zu lassen."

languages.text: « En ce qui me concerne, je n'y ai pas assisté, Weisz m'a jetée dehors avant. Pour autant, les rumeurs qui se sont propagées par la suite sur les ponts ont suffi à me coller une trouille bleue. Cet homme a la puissance d'un vieux grox, mais ses pensées sont un bourbier sans nom. Un bourbier d'ampleur astropathique qui plus est, la pire espèce qui soit. À votre place, j'y réfléchirais à deux fois avant de laisser sortir les horreurs qui vivent dans sa tête. »
languages.original_text: "I didn't see the ritual — Weisz kicked me out. But the echoes of it that reached the decks were enough to scare me shitless. Weisz is a mighty old grox, but his head is a mess. And I mean the bad kind of a mess, the Astropathic kind. I say we think twice before we risk having whatever lives inside his head crawl out."

Pour autant, les rumeurs qui se sont propagées par la suite sur les ponts ont suffi à me coller une trouille bleue. Cet homme a la puissance d'un vieux grox, mais ses pensées sont un bourbier sans nom. Un bourbier d'ampleur astropathique qui plus est, la pire espèce qui soit. À votre place, j'y réfléchirais à deux fois avant de laisser sortir les horreurs qui vivent dans sa tête. »

languages.text: "Ayini ben görmedim, Weisz beni başından savdı. Ancak ayinin yankılarının ödümü koparacak kadarı güvertelere ulaştı. İhtiyar Weisz, kudretli bir groks olsa da kafası allak bullak bir hâlde. Burada kötü manada allak bullak olmasını kastediyorum, Astropatik türden yani. Kafasının içinde İmparator bilir neler yaşıyor. Onların açığa çıkmaları riskini almadan önce bence tekrar düşünelim."
languages.original_text: "I didn't see the ritual — Weisz kicked me out. But the echoes of it that reached the decks were enough to scare me shitless. Weisz is a mighty old grox, but his head is a mess. And I mean the bad kind of a mess, the Astropathic kind. I say we think twice before we risk having whatever lives inside his head crawl out."
